WRITING.TITLE: Read if you want
WRITING.TEXT: Sometimes I feel so alone. Like it #8217;s not that I don #8217;t have friends but even sometimes when I #8217;m with them I still feel alone. I feel like their life would not change if I was gone.

WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;m not running towards death but when it comes I #8217;ll embrace it.

WRITING.TEXT: I feel so fucking alone even when I #8217;m with people
Like I feel like I got friends and shit but still feel like I got no one It #8217;s so..
I guess I #8217;m bound to feel sad because I can #8217;t see the good things just the bad
Yeah me too. I feel like I overthink a lot and always just end up thinking nobody gives a shit about me or that they just straight up don #8217;t like me when that might not always be the case.
True but feels very hard when I feel like I don #8217;t even know what I #8217;m going through.
I feel you man. Also got rejected, shit hurts but ain #8217;t really nothin you can do about it.
Yea. Can #8217;t say everything will be all right but if it #8217;s just a crush then it #8217;s probably easier to get over it. Not that I have but hopefully it #8217;ll happen soon.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel so fucking tired
WRITING.TEXT: I feel so tired and just angry for no reason. I just want to lie in bed and have someone hug me and tell me everything will be alright.
I just feel so fucking scattered. I don #8217;t know what to do.

WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;m worried about myself
WRITING.TEXT: I find myself wanting to numb my feelings more often in bad ways like drugs and alcohol. I don #8217;t want to become addicted but I don #8217;t see myself stopping. Right now it #8217;s not on a bad level but it might escalate and that #8217;s what I #8217;m worried about.
I #8217;m not a professional by any means but if you feel like you actually want to die it doesn #8217;t matter wether you would act upon it you should get help.
Yeah and as you kinda said they can go from being just a thought to a lot more faster than you think so the faster you get help the better

WRITING.TITLE: I feel unlovable.
WRITING.TEXT: I just don #8217;t know why anyone would want me. Like I #8217;m not funny not good looking I just exist. I feel like a background character in my own life.
I #8217;ve taken the first step before been rejected every time.
I know that I am the only one who can get me to a better place but I just don #8217;t think I have the strength to do so anymore.
After years of putting myself lower and lower I don #8217;t see myself changing.

I mean sure I #8217;m overall very caring and nice to almost everyone I come in to contact with. I #8217;m not bad looking or a jerk but all this does not get me out of the hole I #8217;ve dug myself. And years of digging will require years of climbing. I don #8217;t see myself doing it when I might just fall down again.
Well see you there

Well yeah I guess I #8217;ll try my best till the day when I can #8217;t anymore comes. I have tried and I don #8217;t regret it I will keep trying but it doesn #8217;t change how I think of myself sadly.
I actually really enjoyed that song ty for the tip.
I get that and that #8217;s why I don #8217;t think I can change because if I could I would have done it by now. Deep inside maybe I can but I feel to tired to do it.

I mean it #8217;s been a bad couple of years but I see what you mean it doesn #8217;t mean it will always be bad. I mean I only talk about all this on the internet under a different name no one I my life really knows what #8217;s going on in my head. I can find some short periods user the week where I feel happy but the only ones that last longer then 10 min are if I #8217;m intoxicated.
Hopefully it will sooner rather than later
I have hobbies the problem is I seem to find less and less joy in them as time moves on. But yeah it would be good to open up to someone but doubt it will happen anytime soon.

WRITING.TITLE: My goal is to make it past 20 at least.
WRITING.TEXT: I feel like that #8217;s something I could do.
Well we #8217;ll see when I hit 20 if I have the strength for another 10 years.
Great to hear hope things keep looking up

WRITING.TITLE: I feel trapped in my emotions. I don #8217;t know what to do where to go. I feel so confused as to what I #8217;m supposed to do. I feel like I #8217;m trapped in a locked room where the only company I have is my depression.
WRITING.TEXT: Like I feel so trapped and the only escape I see is sleep or death.

WRITING.TITLE: Idk what to do what to write fuck I feel like I can #8217;t keep up with my own thoughts aasjhfdhbsns.
WRITING.TEXT: Fuck I can #8217;t be alone with my thoughts.

I wish I could give you some magical advice but I can #8217;t if I could I would be better myself but I would say try to be there for him as much as you can. Show that you care. Otherwise you know the regular try to find a hobby could work but that really depends on the person and what they are going through. It #8217;s hard to give good advice because everyone is different and what makes a person feel down can be a lot and alot of times they don #8217;t even know why they are depressed.

WRITING.TITLE: When they say it #8217;ll pass. Or it #8217;s just a bad couple of weeks.
WRITING.TEXT: Like fuck you know about that. I #8217;ve felt like shit for 6 years and shit has not gotten better. If I have to wait till I #8217;m 50 to feel ok I #8217;d rather just end my misery. Like I just feel so done with everything.
I don #8217;t see me or my life changing so why bother

Like shit if they have not been through the same thing they don #8217;t know and even if they have they still don #8217;t know. They say shit just to make you hope but deep inside they have no fucking clue whether it #8217;s going to get better or if you #8217;re gonna sit there in 10 years still hopeing you won #8217;t wake up.
I don #8217;t know just saying that I feel like I #8217;m probably the only one that can make me feel better I just don #8217;t know how or if I have the strength to try to figure it out
The problem for me is that I just can #8217;t seem to find any joy in anything anymore. At most I distract myself for an hour or two.
And this is were I fall. I just don #8217;t have the energy for it. I feel a bit like a dick saying that but yeah.

I did not mean that you #8217;re a dick if that #8217;s what you thought. I meant myself for not helping people who might need it and instead just living in my misery. And I get what you mean I just don #8217;t see myself being able to change my mindset I feel like it #8217;s to late for that.
Well hopefully mine can change before it #8217;s truly to late.
Yeah but here arises the problem if I have to wait 10 years for that I just don #8217;t know if it #8217;s worth it.
I feel so trapped in my mindset I just don #8217;t see it changing.
I have not achieved anything.
Yeah true but I can #8217;t really find joy in having done those things sure it #8217;s better than having not done them but I don #8217;t feel accomplished.
Something that find pride in having done which at the moment feels like nothing.
See it would have to be something that could change my life. Getting my drivers license, getting a job or along those lines.
I #8217;m actually in the process of getting it. But yeah I just can #8217;t find happiness in the small things I guess.
Yes it is.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel like I #8217;ve been posting very frequently.
WRITING.TEXT: The last week I #8217;ve posted a lot and I just feel so fucking bad. I don #8217;t know how much longer I can go on. I said at least 20 but to be blunt I don #8217;t think that I can make it until then.

WRITING.TITLE: Honestly fuck life....
WRITING.TEXT: I don #8217;t want to live anymore. It #8217;s just pain and pain everyday it #8217;s just getting worse and worse. Someone please fucking save me.
Wherever the problem lies I can #8217;t keep going like this..

There are probably things but I feel good one time and then shit. And honestly I #8217;m not sure I think the good times are worth it. I mean I feel so bad at the moment I don #8217;t care about the good anymore. The only reason I #8217;m still here is because I don #8217;t want to hurt the people around me and that I #8217;m to big of a pussy to do it.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel weird. Like I #8217;m on the brink of suicide but I don #8217;t think I will do it but still feel like I #8217;m close to it.
WRITING.TEXT: like idk it just goes in a circle. So confused tbh.

WRITING.TITLE: It all will end one day and on that day I will smile and thank everyone who has been with me through this horrible journey. I will thank the world for finally giving me peace. My tired soul will finally get the rest it needs.

WRITING.TEXT: While I definitely experience the call of the void what I meant here was a bit more like I might just slit my wrist at any moment but I still don #8217;t feel like I will.

WRITING.TITLE: I just don #8217;t want to live it #8217;s all to much. Please let me just die in my sleep .
WRITING.TEXT: I don #8217;t want any of this. Why could my life not have been given to someone who could appreciate it. And not me who just hate it and just want it to end. I #8217;m crying my eyes out writing this more than I #8217;ve crying for a long time. I feel so done I just want it all gone.
Going to sleep now hoping once again I don #8217;t wake up.

WRITING.TITLE: This world was never made for me...
WRITING.TEXT: This world was never made for me...

WRITING.TITLE: I #8217;ve given up all hope of ever recovering.
WRITING.TEXT: I have given up. Just hanging on as long as my grip can wich honestly might not be that long.

WRITING.TITLE: I don #8217;t feel good. I just need a fucking hug like please just hold me. I just want to cry. I feel so sad I just don #8217;t know how to go on.

WRITING.TITLE: Pls let me die.
WRITING.TEXT: I wanna go to sleep and never wake up again. I will never find any meaning I will always sleep alone. This life was never meant for me anyway.

WRITING.TITLE: This is just a prayer to something. I don #8217;t believe in god so idk who this is for but.
WRITING.TEXT: Please save me. Grant me the strength to go on. Give me meaning. Please let me find someone to care about and who cares about me.

WRITING.TITLE: You know what. I can #8217;t do this sh*t anymore. F*ck this f*ck life f*ck everyone. I can #8217;t go on.
WRITING.TEXT: If I #8217;m here tomorrow I guess I #8217;m to big of a pu**y I #8217;m fuck scared but I just can #8217;t do this.

WRITING.TITLE: I don #8217;t feel good... I want to be held. I don #8217;t see myself living in one year.

WRITING.TITLE: Why was I born. Just to feel pain or give pain in the form of my death. I don #8217;t feel happiness I don #8217;t feel good about anything. I #8217;m just an empty shell wishing it would be crushed.

Everything.

A lot. I don #8217;t see any point in life. I feel like a disappointment. I don #8217;t see myself ever finding love. I don #8217;t like myself. I feel alone. I hate the world. I #8217;m scared to hurt the ones who care.
Honestly I #8217;m tired of explaining it.
I would not feel like shit anymore I think. I can #8217;t be sure I guess but I believe in just a complete end to consciousness. Just a black boom the end.

Im to scared to end things. It won #8217;t happen now at least. Maybe things will get better. We #8217;ll see which comes first. It #8217;s hard to find things to enjoy when everything you usually enjoy stops bringing you joy.

I mean people have it a lot worse than me and I who have it pretty good still feel like shit it just makes me feel worse like I can #8217;t appreciate what has been given to me.
I just wish I had someone that was trying to save me.

WRITING.TITLE: Why am I so ugly and got a shitty personality.
WRITING.TEXT: Why could I not at least have one. So I could find someone to love and be loved by.

I know but it #8217;s not like. I #8217;m generally a nice person but I just feel like there is nothing to love about it. Like I #8217;m the type you #8217;re friends with nothing more. I don #8217;t know how to work on that.
That #8217;s not what happened. I just feel like everyone just seems to find someone who likes them and I #8217;m here and no ones seems to like me. I feel like I have to be the problem.
Shit I don #8217;t want to have to wait til I #8217;m 30 to find someone that wants to hug me and just talk through the night.
Yeah I might try that.

What writing my problems on Reddit? Or saying that I #8217;m not good enough. Genuinely asking. Feel like I have to add it because I could see someone miss reading it and taking it as passiv aggressiv.
Cyberpunk 2077 is on its way

WRITING.TITLE: Why...
WRITING.TEXT: I feel like so many of the people around me are hurting. And I try to help but most wont really allow me to help. And me feeling depressed as well doesn #8217;t help. I feel like I #8217;ll break down completely soon. Everyday I feel weaker. And this entire world seems so hopeless. Just pain and suffering. Sure there are good things but I feel like the bad outweighs it. Seeing people I care about feeling like shit, feeling like me, it breaks my heart.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel like a waste of a life.
WRITING.TEXT: I feel like a life was wasted on me. Why could not someone who could appreciate all I have been given my life. Instead I sit and wish that I get hit by a car.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel like I #8217;m constantly on the verge of just breaking down.
WRITING.TEXT: I feel like I might just start crying form out of nowhere. Normally I have a hard time crying but now I feel so done. It requires so much energy to hide my feelings and right now I feel like I can #8217;t anymore. I just want to sleep. At least when I sleep I don #8217;t have to fight my fucking brains thoughts all the time. I #8217;m not sure how I #8217;m going to get through this.
I literally panicked a couple days ago. Started shaking and panicking. Punched a wall and started crying. Eventually I calmed down. But I feel like it could happen again soon.

Sure I #8217;m not the only one going through this. I #8217;m not alone. But when I lay in my bed trying to sleep and all the thoughts come lurking and start torturing my mind I #8217;m alone. No one is by my side then just an empty room.
I wish you all the best.
I feel like I should be happy but I #8217;m not.
And what I meant with decent life is that I have a good family for example and that #8217;s more than some have.
What? I have not done anything that would get me arrested?
Hahahha alright. I was like did I miss-write something reading through my post again.
I feel the same way.

I #8217;m taking a wild guess but probably because he has been feeling alone for 30 years and after that long it #8217;s hard to see things changeing. I feel the same and I #8217;ve not been feeling alone for more than 5-7 years or so.

WRITING.TITLE: A couple of years ago the thought of me killing my self was unreal. Like I did not enjoy living but killing myself did not feel like an option.
WRITING.TEXT: But now the thought feels closer everyday. More real like it #8217;s not a thought anymore it #8217;s a look at the future. I don #8217;t think what if, more like when will it happen. I still feel like I probably won #8217;t but I feel like the resistance to killing myself becomes less everyday.
I relate a lot to this. It really sucks. This thought drains the little will to live I have left
Feel the same.

I can #8217;t take the pain away but I #8217;m here if you want to talk/vent anytime. I can #8217;t relate to everything because I have never opened up to someone close to me but I know what it #8217;s like to be hurting.
I know. And I can #8217;t prove that I #8217;m different I don #8217;t know if I am but I #8217;ll try my best to be. I #8217;m not magic but I try to be there because I know how lonely it can get.

WRITING.TITLE: A friend who I have talked with a little about my feelings. (Very little). Asked me how I was yesterday and honestly it meant a lot.
WRITING.TEXT: I kinda lied which I kinda regret but I said something along the lines of #8220;I #8217;m pretty ok #8221;. But it still meant a lot to just get that question out of nowhere.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel so tired. Just done.
WRITING.TEXT: I don #8217;t feel like anything. Just a big void. I don #8217;t think I #8217;ll make it through this. And at this point I #8217;m not even sure if I care.

Honestly I don #8217;t fucking know anymore. Nothing, everything. I feel so fucking scattered and sick of everything. The world, the people in it, myself. I just want to be happy and feel good about life but I don #8217;t. I want to fucking die. It all to end. But can #8217;t fucking do that because then I put people who care in the same shoes I #8217;m in and I can #8217;t do that but I #8217;m not sure how much longer I can keep going. I feel like in a couple years I #8217;m either dead or on the verge of over dosing on whatever drug kept me going for so long.
Maybe they #8217;ll pass but they been with me for what like 4 years now and I #8217;m not sure I have the strength for another 4 years.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel ok with dying.
WRITING.TEXT: It doesn #8217;t matter anymore. If I die or not. I don #8217;t care. Either I #8217;ll die and embrace the sweet relief of death. Or I #8217;ll live with the pain. At this point I just feel like nothing. Would it matter if I did not exist. Answer no. No ones life would be affected. Not if I killed myself because that would affect people but not if I never existed. No ones life would be different because I make no impact on the world.

WRITING.TITLE: I feel so weird.
WRITING.TEXT: I don #8217;t understand my current mindset. I feel depressed but like contempt with my current sadness. Like I #8217;m happy to be sad.
Well if someone would like me I #8217;m scared to let that go because I know how hard it is for me to find some who can like me because I #8217;ve not yet found that.
Honestly think it #8217;ll be the death of me.
Ye
I know that I almost need to love myself for someone to love me but I #8217;m sad to say that that probably won #8217;t happen
Guess I #8217;m domed to be alone. I #8217;m sorry but I won #8217;t ever love myself. Sure there are somethings I like about me but it #8217;s not enough to make me like myself.

Yeah I know which people to hold onto. But trying to keep some people in my life that literally does nothin to keep me in theirs just takes to much unnecessary energy. I know some people that care about our friendship. They ones that show that they want to have me in their life. It could just be like talking to me or something just some sort of thing showing they don #8217;t just see me as any other random person.

I #8217;m in the same position. Right now I #8217;m laying in bed not doing anything but listen to music that I barely feel like I enjoy anymore. I just want to sleep so I can be unconscious and not have to think. I feel like shit everyday I wake up and have to go to school. Hope things start looking up for you.

WRITING.TITLE: When I panic I feel comforted by the fact that I could just kill myself.
WRITING.TEXT: Like all my problems and feelings would go away. All the shit that makes me feel this way would not matter. I would be at peace.
It #8217;s the fact that if I really needed to I could put an end to all the pain.
What do you mean with this point. You mean mentally or like how have I made it this far?
Well I just just can #8217;t seem to find much joy in life. I don #8217;t feel good very often. I don #8217;t see much point. I #8217;m just not very happy with life in general.
Well I enjoy almost nothing anymore. Most things I do just to pass time. Just to make life go on.
Well I mostly play video games. But lately I #8217;ve pretty much been sleeping from when I get home to when I eat dinner then I go back to sleep.
Well I play a lot like random games but games I play more are cs go(not as much anymore but from time to time) and rockets league.
Yeah I actually played it when it was in beta. Got it in drop like two days after the beta went live.
Not sure if I got a lot of skills though

I #8217;ve played league as well don #8217;t enjoy it a lot. I mean sure I might try it. Have only play like 5 games or so since the release. I don #8217;t think I have a rank yet but met like gold-plat something. Don #8217;t know really the ranks.
Yeah true. It #8217;s free so it #8217;s not really a loss. But ok so I guess I #8217;m decent then. But I would say my biggest issue is to now how to use and counter different abilities.
Well I mean I have thoughts of killing myself and the thought of me actually doing it doesn #8217;t feel to far away.
I mean that I don #8217;t just think this way to reassure myself it #8217;s just a product of the thought not the reason. The reason is that I don #8217;t enjoy life anymore.
Wtf are the odds i just put on lil peep part one and it #8217;s 2:55 and this is the first thing I see on Reddit.

I feel like I can #8217;t and I also feel like I #8217;ve given up at this point. I #8217;ll keep going as long as I can to not hurt the people who care but I don #8217;t see myself ever getting better.

WRITING.TITLE: I want to post but I just feel so done so blank. Like all my thoughts are tired. I can #8217;t be bothered trying to express myself anymore.
WRITING.TEXT: I don #8217;t know myself anymore. I don #8217;t know who I am, what I want and why I feel this way. I just want to float away.

WRITING.TITLE: This has been a better day than most and I feel like I felt a little happy today. But yet I still feel like shit.
WRITING.TEXT: Like I feel unhappy being happy. I don #8217;t know how to explain it. Like I #8217;m happy but miserable at the same time. Almost feel like I know I #8217;m supposed to feel bad and so I make myself feel that way even when I #8217;m not. But today I felt better than any other day for probably like three months or so. Not good but a little better. These past 3 months have been horrible. Like I #8217;ve been depressed for something like 4 years but these past months have been something new. Just pure misery all the time.
And now I #8217;m back to feeling like pure shit. Good to be back everybody.
Don #8217;t make sense going to heaven with them goodie-goodies dressed in white I like black timbs and black hoodies.

WRITING.TITLE: I will be alone forever and I accept that.
WRITING.TEXT: I know I won #8217;t ever find love. It #8217;s just not meant for me I guess. If it was I would at least had some interaction with it with all these years on this earth. I #8217;m bound to die alone.
Ive tried man don #8217;t think I haven #8217;t.

Maybe. But I just can #8217;t see someone loving me. Like I just see all the times I #8217;ve tried and failed. I just feel like there is just nothing to love because otherwise I feel like at least one would have liked me.
I feel the same
Well I #8217;ve tried but I just have not seen any interest from the other person. Could just be me being blind but who knows.

Well even if I found someone would it be fair to them to have them live with a broken person like me. Someone who has such a hard time seeing anything positive is that really what anyone would want. It #8217;s better if whoever that person could be gets to live a happy life with someone who #8217;s better then me.
Never Said it #8217;ll solve my problems just said I #8217;ll never experience it.
This has happened to two of the girls I liked. One of them I like right now. It really sucks. Like why can #8217;t I be good enough or someone.
I relate to this so much. I just want someone to care and That I can care about that person to.
Yep i know. Having a hard time changing it though

Everyone had problems and sometimes they try to use them to relate but it comes of bad. And sometimes they just can #8217;t help and they just use you to get help themselves. Please don #8217;t kill yourself. I know shit looks dark and you don #8217;t see any light. But what if it changes the day after you killed yourself. I might not be sure but what if. I know how hard it is to live when everyday you wake up you feel like you just want to be dead. I feel it too. But let #8217;s try to keep going the both of us. I believe your life can become better. But I can #8217;t say that it will. But what do you have to lose if you keep going a while longer.
